entries.abort: Yeah, get out of here. We are not in need of your assistance.
entries.angry_disable: Imperial dog! What is the meaning of this outrage?
entries.arrival_phase_1: We are working on getting a lock on the vessel. Once you have its location, travel to her, and bring her back to HQ.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Sending location of vessel to your nav computer. Go get us that freighter.
entries.capture_complete: Capture process completed. Freighter vessel set to autopilot.
entries.capture_phase_1: We have nothing you Imperials are interested in.
entries.capture_phase_2: Alright, alright already! We will set the ship on autopilot. Just don't get trigger happy.
entries.complete: Nice work, pilot. Our freighter contains a lot more of that material you picked up from that smaller smuggler ship.
entries.failed_destroy: They would rather destroy that ship then let us find out what was on it? We really need one of those ships back in one piece. Report to your superior.
entries.failed_escape: You failed to capture us that ship. Report back to your commander and explain your actions.
entries.panic_1: Oh, great! They hired me and now they are coming to blow me out of the sky.
entries.panic_2: Well, they said this was going to be dangerous.
entries.panic_3: They look like they mean business.
entries.panic_4: Oh, great! They hired me and now they are coming to blow me out of the sky.
entries.panic_5: Oh, great! They hired me and now they are coming to blow me out of the sky.
entries.quest_escort_d: Bring the smuggler back to a designated jump location. Keep a close watch over the smuggler in case anyone attempts to free him.
entries.quest_location_d: Command got a lock on the vessel landing on the surface. Once the ship takes off you will receive a navigation waypoint to its current location.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once disabled, move your fighter in close and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.recovery_success: Vessel is underway. Nice job, pilot.
entries.split_quest_alert: Alert! Distress signal incoming from damaged recon vessel. Assist vessel with repairs and escort it to safety.
entries.target_disabled: The freighter has been disabled. Start docking procedures and capture that ship.
entries.taunt_1: If we can't have her, no one will!
entries.taunt_3: You should have left well enough alone.
entries.taunt_4: This will only hurt for a second.
entries.taunt_5: I am going to make this quick.
entries.thanks_1: Your turning me over to the Inquisition? What kind of monster are you?
entries.thanks_2: Your turning me over to the Inquisition? What kind of monster are you?
entries.thanks_3: Your turning me over to the Inquisition? What kind of monster are you?
entries.thanks_4: Your turning me over to the Inquisition? What kind of monster are you?
entries.thanks_5: Your turning me over to the Inquisition? What kind of monster are you?
entries.title: Dathomir System: Capture the Crystal Smuggler
entries.title_d: The crystals that were recovered from the smuggler are among the most contraband material in the Empire. Just the few crystals that the smuggler had are worth a small fortune, but the question remains, how did they know those crystals were on Dathomir? Ever since that smuggler was discovered command has been keeping even closer watch and they have found another apparent crystal smuggler. This time you are to capture the vessel and bring it back so command can question its pilot and investigate its contents.
